p: Sample Collection: Nasopharyngeal swabs were collected from unrelated patients and tested for SARS-CoV-2 presence as a standard care protocol for routine diagnosis in Umraniye Training and Research Hospital (UEAH), Istanbul. Three patients whose tests positive for SARS-CoV-2 with qRT-PCR testing were included in this study. This study was approved by the ethics committee of the Umraniye Training and Research Hospital (B.10.1.TKH.4.34.H.GP.0.01/95) and a written informed consent was obtained from all participating patients.
